title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – CLI and Go library to pull, run, and manage quantized Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/CPU inference.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama REST API; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; pip install ollama – chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with sync & async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat endpoint in chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to your local Ollama instance; chat, multi-user, model manager, dark mode, mobile friendly.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama – Maven Central artifact offering sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, list, delete with streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI chatbot, Next.js app, Discord bot, RAG with Chroma, function-calling examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Official Nix package for Ollama; pin version, enable CUDA, declarative model cache in configuration.nix.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-stage Dockerfile (CUDA & CPU) plus docker-compose examples with persistent model volume.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: FastAPI + Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain to chat over your PDFs privately.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into threads; supports slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with optional thread follow-ups.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside notes and insert results, great for summarization.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama – GenServer-backed connection pooling, streaming, and LiveView hooks.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library with comptime JSON mapping; tiny static binary for embedded or CLI tools.
